attributes.action: Not Penalise owners of older 4 X 4 Vehicles due to outdated emission standards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the Prime Minister, to not penalise the owners of older 4x4 vehicles due to their emissions.

At the time of manufacture, such vehicles were within standards of required emissions.

It is not the owners fault that legislation changes and the vehicle they own now has a higher emission standard to that required by current or future legislation.

Many cannot afford to change their vehicles and are therefore being descriminated against financially for something they own and cannot replace.

Therefore it would be fairer to introduce a vehicle registration age  limitation, such as was introduced when the seatbelt legislation was introduced. This would be fairer to individuals who currently own such older vehicles.
